message.content:
1. Measurements were performed after anaesthesia induction.
2. The time of measurement after anaesthesia induction is referred to as T0.
3. Measurements were performed at the end of surgery.
4. The time of measurement at the end of surgery is referred to as T1.
5. Measurements were performed within 2 hours after surgery.
6. The time of measurement within 2 hours after surgery is referred to as T2.
7. Measurements were performed 24 hours after the beginning of surgery.
8. The time of measurement 24 hours after the beginning of surgery is referred to as T3.

messages.content:
Statement: Measurements were performed after anaesthesia induction (T0), at the end of surgery (T1), within 2 h after surgery (T2) and 24 h after the beginning of surgery (T3).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
